title: Instruments
description: Manage scientific instruments and CIFS service accounts
sa_password_hint: Leave blank to keep current password
form_pid_tip: Persistent Identifier â€” a unique label for this instrument in external registries
form_cifs_host_tip: Hostname or IP address of the CIFS/SMB file server (e.g. fileserver.lab.local)
form_cifs_share_tip: Share name on the server (e.g. data). No leading slashes.
form_base_path_tip: Sub-directory within the share to use as the harvest root. Leave blank to start from the share root.
form_adapter_tip: Tool used to copy files. rclone works for most setups; Globus requires a registered endpoint; rsync works for POSIX targets.
form_service_account_tip: CIFS credentials used to authenticate to this server. Create a service account first.
sa_domain_tip: Windows Active Directory domain (e.g. LAB). Leave blank for local or workgroup accounts.
